problems.title: Check if Array is Palindrome
problems.description: Check whether the given array is a palindrome. Print "true" if palindrome, otherwise print "false".
problems.examples:
Sample Input
5
1 2 3 2 1

Sample Output
true

Sample Input
4
1 2 3 4

Sample Output
false
hintsList: Use two pointers starting from both ends and compare elements.
